input.sentences: i joined siskoteck a few days ago .
we made the latest in cutting edge tech .
they made the first hdmi converter for tvs .
but it was the new video recorder equipment that caught my eye .
i ended up recording days worth of footage using the camera at our first convention .
output.sentences: In 4 days siskoteck would be joined with the other company
The tech is extremely cutting edge
The converter they created will work on tvs and hdmi
The recorder will play video and the definition is similar to an eye
The meeting was worth recording with extra footage of the unit.
